title: Students never get to see corrected answer sheets?
content: Is there any way of seeing the corrected answer scripts? And not just the ones where a teacher has signed on a page to indicate it has been corrected.

comments.body: Nope as far as I know. The only way to see ESA answer scripts is to raise a request on the portal and also pay money for it, and even then you'll be given access for a limited time only (X number of hours).
